call_title: Dev Update August 11 2024 |  Rosen Bridge, Crystal Pool, Paideia, Celaut, Sigs Mining, and more!

decisions.decision: Both 5.0 and 5.1 will be supported for some time, with 5.0 being the default release in Docker
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: To not break compatibility and workflow of users using the latest tag
decisions.quote: For some time, well, both 5.0 and 5.1 will be supported, right? So both releases will be done. Yeah, 5.0 will be actually default release, right, in Docker and so on.

decisions.decision: Proposing to eliminate dubious terms such as 'official' from the readme
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: The term 'official repository' was confusing and appears on every forked repository
decisions.quote: Proposing a readme update for the notes to eliminate some dubious terms, such as official.

decisions.decision: LP redemption contract was deployed today
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.quote: And today the contract was deployed, so now I'm going to recheck

commitments.commitment: Release 0.23 after testing, maybe around the end of next week
commitments.quote: So maybe around the end of the, next week, let's see.

commitments.commitment: Review PRs for 0.24 over the weekend
commitments.quote: I will review them over the weekend

commitments.commitment: Recheck bank contracts and deploy remaining mainnet contracts to start Dexy
commitments.quote: so now I'm going to recheck Bank contracts and yeah, with that we can deploy remaining mainnet contracts and start actually Dexy with that.

commitments.commitment: Work on receives and other weekends, will play with the server
commitments.quote: and other weekends I will play with the server

commitments.commitment: Write a paper for Amix on ChainCash
commitments.quote: So yeah, we'll spend some time in coming weeks on that also.

open_questions.question: Do we call this pool a fork?
open_questions.context: Regarding the new Sigmanauts mining pool setup

open_questions.question: What to do with the Explorer
open_questions.context: There are few unfinished attempts to do something as a replacement of current Explorer

reversals_or_updates.reason: Will be the primary backend for pool moving forward
reversals_or_updates.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: 5.1 requires a full resync because it's a new database
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Current Sigmanauts pool costs $100 per month, $50 per server
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: New service will cost 10-20 bucks per month per server, cutting costs to a quarter
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: New version of SigmaRust released after many months without new releases
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: SigmaRust new release has three contributors: PGR456, Dusek, and UnknownBear
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Have 100 wallets to hand out, will probably make a couple more cards
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Abstract got accepted for Amix paper
key_facts.speaker: kushti
